>
[Stunning Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6434) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=803" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=267)

**Prerequisites**
[Startling Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6429)

</column>

---

Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond. When you use Startling Appearance and your [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) hits an enemy of your level or lower, the enemy is also [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93) 1 on a hit, or stunned 2 on a critical hit.
name: Stunning Appearance
